---
title: "Philly Livability"
---

# Livability Scores 
```{r}
df_philly_2015 %>% 
  mutate(residential_environment = scale(supermarket_nearby) + scale(green_spaces) + scale(walkability)) %>%
  group_by(county_code) %>%
  summarise(resi_mean = mean(residential_environment)) %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = reorder(county_code, resi_mean, desc), y = resi_mean, fill=factor(ifelse(county_code=="Philadelphia","City","Suburb")))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_manual(name = "Area", values=c("red","grey50")) +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(title = "2015 Philly Index of Residential Environment", subtitle = "Residential Environment = Near Supermarket + Green Space Access + Walkability", y = "Residential Environment Index", x = "County" ) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color = text_color))
```
